title: G.C.E. Advanced Level (A/L) - Physical Science Stream
description: A strong foundation in the Physical Science (Maths) stream is essential, as renewable energy is a deeply technical field. High marks in Combined Mathematics and Physics are critical for an engineering degree.

title: Bachelor's Degree in Engineering
description: Complete a BScEng degree, typically in Electrical or Mechanical Engineering. During your degree, choose elective courses related to renewable energy, such as solar power, wind energy, or energy management.
qualifications: BScEng (Hons) in Electrical or Mechanical Engineering
salaryRangeLKR: LKR 70,000 - 110,000 (Trainee Engineer in a related field)

title: Entry-Level Engineer & Specialization
description: Join a renewable energy company (e.g., a solar power installer) as a Junior Engineer. This is where you gain practical, hands-on experience. Consider a Master's degree or professional certifications to specialize further.

title: Renewable Energy Project Engineer / Manager
description: Take responsibility for managing renewable energy projects, from initial site assessment and design to installation and commissioning. This role requires a blend of technical engineering and project management skills.
institutes: Leading renewable energy developers and EPC contractors

title: Senior Specialist / Consultant / Policy Advisor
description: Advance to a senior role where you lead the technical strategy for a large company, work as an independent consultant advising on large-scale projects, or join a government or international body to help shape renewable energy policy.
